morale_boost.name: Morale Boost
morale_boost.description: Temporarily increases a unit's morale, improving combat effectiveness for a short duration.

scouting_report.name: Scouting Report
scouting_report.description: Reveals a larger area of the map around your King at the start of the game.

rapid_dispatch.name: Rapid Dispatch
rapid_dispatch.description: Your messengers travel twice as fast for a limited time, reducing the risk of interception.

reinforce_pawn.name: Reinforce Pawn
reinforce_pawn.description: Deploy an additional Pawn unit at your starting position during the planning phase.

overhead_view.name: Overhead View
overhead_view.description: Briefly lifts the fog of war over a large area, revealing enemy positions.
